bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Clinch River Coal Company conducted business during the early twentienth century in Tazewell County, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Payroll ledger, 1910-1912, of Clinch River Coal Company records the daily earnings and deductions of employees. Entries record the name of employee; the number of hours worked or tons hauled per day; the number of deductions; totals for the month; rate of pay; total earnings; deductions for purchases at company store, rent, services of company physician, insurance, coal, smithing, powder, and cash advances; total of worker's earnings; total of deductions taken from employee's pay; and balance due employee or to the company.
